title: Commission Decision of 22 December 1986 approving the fourth amendment to the plan for the accelerated eradication of classical swine fever, submitted by Italy (Only the Italian text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 22 December 1986
approving the fourth amendment to the plan for the accelerated eradication of classical swine fever, submitted by Italy
(Only the Italian text is authentic)
(87/109/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The fourth amendment to the plan for the accelerated eradication of classical swine fever, submitted by Italy, is hereby approved.
The amendment to the plan referred to in Article 1 shall take effect on 1 January 1987.
This Decision is addressed to the Italian Republic.
